channel.title: Sailing on YOUR DAILY LIMERICK
channel.description: Recent content in Sailing on limericks.dailyonthis.site

item.description: A daring jeweler set sail one day, He wanted an adventure to play. He loaded up his boat, And set off to float, On the wide open sea he …
A miner from a distant shore Sailed a ship with a bold explore To find gold and gems The voyage begins With a fortune to enrich and restore. …
An athlete was out sailing one day With the sun shining brightly, he did stay For a race he was prepped To beat all the rest He sailed on …
There once was a comedian sailing With his wit he was regaling His boat went astray But he still had his say Making even the waves start …
A graceful dancer sailing through the air, Whose moves are as smooth as a mare, Gently she glides, No one beside, In perfect harmony with …
A medical expert sailing the sea, Dreamed of a cure for humanity. The waves tossed, And the boat crossed, In search of a remedy.
There once was a farmer, who yearned to explore, So he took up a life of sailing the shore. His hands steady and sure, He’d glide o’er the …
A counselor decided sailing was her goal, She found the ocean to be her soul. Her sails were raised In the sea she was dazed A true sailor, …
A politician from the town square Decided to go sailing out there Their hopes were high As they cut through the sky Their ambition to never …
There once was a historian sailing, Casting off on the wind-filled sails ringing, The ocean’s call was strong, He ventured along, Always …
A biologist was sailing one day, From the port out to sea, far away. To observe the wildlife That stayed in the wild, All the way ’til the …
An astronaut sailing through space, Found joy in the wonders he’d face. He marveled and smiled At the stars for a while, Exploring the …
A psychologist set sail one day, Determined to explore and survey. The sea was calm, His journey balm, A voyage of knowledge he did purvey.
